original_title: Am Kap der Liebe - Unter der Sonne Uruguays
overview: The Hamburg shipowner Jan Hansen proudly transfers a magnificent, brand new sailing yacht to Uruguay, which he lovingly designed in accordance with the wishes of the rich wood manufacturer Don Esteban Gonzales. But no sooner has the "Rheingold" docked in the port of Montevideo than things start to happen. To Jan's great surprise, his girlfriend and travel companion, the marine biologist Anne, rejects his marriage proposal.
title: Am Kap der Liebe - Unter der Sonne Uruguays
